Prints for sale

Semi-gloss paper, non-destructively mounted on archive grade mat and backing board.
Framed prints come in simple black wood frames with UV Glass.

Print Size Matted Framed
5x7 $40 $80
8x10 $100 $160
11x14 $140 $225
All framed prints come in a 1.5" white mat. That means the 5x7 print fits in an 8x10 frame, the 8x10 an 11x14 frame, and the 11x14 fits in an 18x24.
